channel.title: Choose a race upon starting?
channel.description:
K after reading a topic in RSC advertisement it looked like a decent idea for a server, and i need to learn some coding so i thought that it'll be a nice way to learn.
I want to make a server where there is
Fally : 1 team. Faladorians or whatever Barb Village : Basically the wildy Varrock : Other 'team's side Lumby - start area + quest/skill area i s'pose Edge - Trading area + shop npc's.
Going to bar off the rest of the land.
What i want is for when you start, you start next to an npc, alright i can do that, you talk to him and he asks you what side you would like to join
you tell him which one, he says are you sure, you say yes and get tele'd to the starting place + starter (i can do that), and no you go back and choose again, now how would i make it go into the character files so people couldnt go back to lumby and repeat this over and over for starters? And i want to make it so it says like
With the rights etc... jad etc..
Faladorian : 0 Varrockwhatever : 1
depending on the side you choose-
Thanks for your help, ill elaborate if needed- if you want to help me via msn - jeddac@hotmail.com
Ill rep for help + credits :)

item.title: Choose a race upon starting?
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

I just need to know how to get it to update starter now

Read full topic

item.title: Choose a race upon starting?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

you could just make the starting area a place where you cant go back to, without admin, or no clipping,

Read full topic
